title: Tram timetable changes in April 2023
articleContent:
From Sunday 16 April 2023, there will be minor changes to journey times and timetables on the Williams, Flinders and Collins street tram corridors.

What's changing?

  • There will be new timetables for tram routes 11, 12, 35, 48, 58, 70, 75 and 109.
  • There will be minor journey time changes on tram routes 58, 70 and 75 to improve reliability and punctuality.

Passengers should check their timetables before they travel and plan ahead.

Passengers can view the new timetables now

Route 11 West Preston - Victoria Harbour Docklands
Route 12 Victoria Gardens - St Kilda
Route 35 City Circle
Route 48 North Balwyn - Victoria Harbour Docklands
Route 58 West Coburg - Toorak
Route 70 Waterfront City Docklands
Route 75 Vermont South - Central Pier Docklands
Route 109 Box Hill - Port Melbourne

To plan your journey, visit the Journey planner or order a printed copy of a timetable by calling 1800 800 007.
